block.p: MIKOLOWSKI-Yelena. Beloved wife of Colonel Edward K. Mikolowski of Providence, R.I. Also survived by mother, Tatiana Krasnochekova of New York City. Reposing Synod of Bishops, 75 E. 93 St. at Park Ave., Manhattan, Friday from 5-9 PM. Funeral services Saturday, 10 AM. Interment Novo Diveeva Russian Orthodox Convent Cemetery, Spring Valley, NY. Call Peter Jarema Funeral Home, 212-674-2568, for information.
